title: (x) Faux Design Studio - Timesz, Palatino, ITC Zapf Dingbats {Mark S}
author: nosh

comments.content: FAUX is Times, artificially condensed. Design Studio is Palatino. Oh, and that diamond thing is from Zapf Dingbats.
that was lighting quick! you guys are great! Thanks
:P And the version of photoshop used to export the image BTW? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125251im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) Great ID Mark.

well im not sure if your serios about wanting to know where i exported from... but if you were. i exported from PS8(CS)and then resized in corel draw 11. The font underneath is arial right (im such a font newbie!) ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125251im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Hmm... I think the font at the bottom is [News Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125251/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/news-gothic/bold/testdrive.html?s=ExclusiveFauxFinishes&p=36) or [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125251/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold-no-2/testdrive.html?s=ExclusiveFauxFinishes&p=36) stretched.   
   
Chris, no need to feel stupid. It's hard to tell when people are joking around here sometimes. :-)
